definition: to make friends/to meet friends/member of the same organization
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: If you rely on a church membe morership.
sentences.chinese: 借使你依賴教會會友的身份。

sentences.english: If you rely on a church membership.
sentences.chinese: 如果你依賴教會會友的身份。

sentences.english: If you wish to be a member of the church, please contact Pastor Liew.
sentences.chinese: 如你想成爲教會會友，請聯絡劉牧師。

sentences.english: When you desire to join the church.
sentences.chinese: 當你參加教會而想成爲會友時。

sentences.english: So why should I bother to seek out the church's fellowship?
sentences.chinese: 既然如此，我們爲甚麼仍要費神與教會會友交往呢？

sentences.english: Q. How many Quakers does it take to screw in a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 把一個燈泡轉進燈座，需要多少位貴格會會友呢？

sentences.english: Out of praise and thanks to God, the whole congregation joins in song.
sentences.chinese: 在教會中，全體會友一起唱歌來讚美和感謝神。

sentences.english: This whole chapter is filled with instructions regarding the various groups.
sentences.chinese: 這整章經文充滿對待不同類別會友的建議。

definition: appreciation of the finer things in life
to talk freely/to discuss without inhibition
(formal) to honor with one's presence/to attend
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
